english.segment2: You caught my soul when I was struggling to breathe. You made me whole and now Your majesty I see. I belong to You. I belong to You
english.segment4: You light my way everyday. You help me see what I can be. I cry to You my spirit song. Come use my life for You alone
english.segment6: I hear Your voice it leads me on. Into Your arms where I belong. I cry to You my spirit song. Come use my life for You alone
english.segment9: I know You're ev'rything. You're all I'll ever need. I know You're ev'rything to me. (REPEAT 4X)
